Room.Text: *I'M outside an open window on the ledge of a very tall building
sandy beach on a tropical isle
*I'm at the foot of a cave ridden hill, a pathway leads on up to the top
*I'm on top of a hill. Below is Pirates Island. Across the sea way off in the distance I see Treasure Island
*I'm aboard Pirate ship anchored off shore
spooky old graveyard filled with piles of empty and broken rum bottles
shallow lagoon. to the north is the ocean

ADVENT.Message: The book is in bad condtion but I can make out the title: 'Treasure Island'. There's a word written in blood in the flyleaf: 'YOHO' and a message: 'Long John Silver left 2 treasures on Treasure Island'
There's something there all right. Maybe I should
I may need to say a MAGIC word here!
Everything spins around and suddenly I'm elsewhere...
I was wrong, I guess its not a mongoose cause the snakes bit it!
Parrot attacks snakes and drives them off
There are a set of plans in it
Pirate grabs rum and scuttles off chortling
They're plans to build the Jolly Roger (a Pirate ship!) You'll need: hammer, nails, lumber, anchor, sails, and a keel.
Pirate awakens and says 'Aye matey we be casting off soon' He then VANISHES!
Pirate says: `Aye matey we be needing a map first`.
After a day at sea we set anchor off of a sandy beach. All Ashore who's going Ashore...
Its a map to Treasure Island. At the bottom it says: '30 paces then dig!'
* Welcome to Adventure number 2: 'pirate adventure' by Alexis and Scott Adams, dedicated: Ted Heeren and Paul Sharland Remember you can always ask for 'help'.
CONGRATULATIONS !!! But your Adventure is not over yet...
I'm underwater, I guess I don't swim well. Blub Blub...
Pirate says: 'Aye me Buckeroo, we be waiting for the tide to come in!'
Note here says: `I be liking parrots, they be smart matey!`
Pirate follows me ashore as if expecting something
Parrot attacks crocs but is beaten off
Bird flys off looking very unhappy
Pirate says: 'First Yee be getting that ACCURSED thing off me ship!'
Ask for Adventure number 3: 'MISSION IMPOSSIBLE' at your favorite computer dealer. If they DON'T carry 'ADVENTURE' have them call: 1-305-862-6917 TODAY! 'ADVENTURE' also supports lower case!
All right, POOF the GAME is destroyed!
I don't know where to look!

Item.Text: Rock wall with narrow crack in it
Rum bottle smashed into pieces. Sign `Opposite of LIGHT is Unlight`
Sign in the sand says: `Welcome to Pirates Island, watch out for the tide!`
